ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: For the past 5 years, Wine Import Thailand has been successfully operating behind the scenes, managing wine imports for a select group of restaurants, hotels, and private clients.
ourStory.paragraph2: We have handled hundreds of shipments, fully licensed and compliant with all Thai regulations — managing every aspect of FDA registration, excise taxes, customs clearance, storage, and delivery.
ourStory.paragraph3: Now, after years of experience serving a few exclusive clients, we are opening our service to a wider audience — giving businesses and individuals across Thailand access to legal, transparent, and cost-efficient wine importing.

whyWeExist.title: Why We Exist
whyWeExist.subtitle: The Thai wine importing landscape has challenges that we're here to solve:

highMarkups.title: High Importer Markups
highMarkups.description: Traditional importers add significant margins, making wines expensive for end customers

limitedSelection.title: Limited Selection
limitedSelection.description: Most importers focus on mass-market wines, leaving little room for unique or boutique producers

complexRegulations.title: Complex Import Regulations
complexRegulations.description: Thai import laws are complicated, with multiple licenses, permits, and compliance requirements

hiddenCosts.title: Hidden Costs & Fees
hiddenCosts.description: Many services have unclear pricing structures with surprise charges and hidden fees

whyWeExist.solution: We created Wine Import Thailand to provide a transparent, cost-effective alternative — giving you direct access to the wines you want at prices that make sense.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: To democratize wine importing in Thailand by providing transparent, legal, and cost-effective import services that connect wine lovers with the wines they want — without the traditional barriers, markups, or complexity.

experience.title: 5+ Years of Industry Experience
experience.description: Proven track record with hundreds of successful shipments

licensed.title: Licensed Importer (FDA, Excise, Customs)
licensed.description: Full regulatory compliance and official certifications

cta.description: We handle the bureaucracy — you focus on the wine.

productTypes.title: More Than Just Wine
productTypes.subtitle: While we specialize in wine, our license and expertise allow us to handle much more.
productTypes.intro: In addition to wine, we can import:

spirits.title: Spirits & Liquors
spirits.description: Complete range of alcoholic beverages and premium spirits

beverages.title: Non-Alcoholic Beverages
beverages.description: Juices, soft drinks, specialty waters, and premium beverages

food.title: Food Products & Ingredients
food.description: Cheese, cured meats, oils, sauces, and specialty food items

productTypes.conclusion: Whether you're sourcing for your restaurant, hotel, private club, retail shop or personal collection — we offer a complete, fully legal import solution.

logisticsOptions.title: Logistics Options
logisticsOptions.subtitle: Flexible shipping solutions to meet your timeline and budget requirements.

sea.title: Sea Freight
sea.description: Cost-effective for large volumes with longer transit times

air.title: Air Freight
air.description: Fast delivery for urgent shipments and smaller quantities

land.title: Land Transport
land.description: Efficient overland shipping from neighboring countries

servicesList.title: Complete Import Services
servicesList.subtitle: We handle every aspect of the import process from start to finish:

permits.title: Import License & Permits
permits.description: We operate under full FDA and Excise licenses, covering alcohol and food imports.

fda.title: FDA Registration & Compliance
fda.description: We handle all product registration, health approvals, and compliance paperwork.

customs.title: Customs Clearance
customs.description: We manage all customs formalities, taxes, duties, and documentation on your behalf.

excise.title: Excise & Alcohol Tax Management
excise.description: We calculate, declare, and pay all applicable excise and local taxes, fully transparent.

logistics.title: Logistics & Storage
logistics.description: We coordinate international shipping, bonded storage, and domestic delivery directly to your location.

documentation.title: Documentation & Legal Support
documentation.description: We handle all necessary documentation for Thai regulatory compliance.

gatewayIntro.title: Your Gateway to the Thai Market
gatewayIntro.paragraph1: Thailand's food & beverage market is growing rapidly, with strong demand for high-quality wines, spirits, and specialty food products from around the world.
gatewayIntro.paragraph2: At Wine Import Thailand, we help overseas wineries, distilleries, and food producers legally and efficiently bring their products into Thailand — without the need to establish a local company or navigate complex Thai regulations on their own.

producerServices.title: What We Offer to Overseas Producers
producerServices.subtitle: We act as your official legal importer, compliance partner, and commercial gateway into Thailand.

legal.title: Full legal import under our licenses
legal.description: Excise, Customs, Alcohol Permits - all covered

tax.title: Full excise, customs, and tax handling
tax.description: Complete tax and regulatory compliance management

logistics.title: Global logistics by sea, air, or land

storage.title: Free zone & bonded warehouse storage
storage.description: Tax deferral until release with legal storage

network.title: Access to our network
network.description: Restaurants, hotels, private clients, and retailers

partnership.title: Partnership with local distributors
partnership.description: Support your sales team and deliver across Thailand

whatYouDontNeed.title: What You DON'T Need
whatYouDontNeed.subtitle: Unlike other import solutions, with us you don't need to:

items.company: Set up a Thai company or legal entity
items.licenses: Apply for your own import licenses (FDA, Excise, Customs)
items.office: Establish a physical office or presence in Thailand
items.staff: Hire local staff or Thai business partners
items.regulations: Navigate complex Thai regulations on your own
items.taxes: Manage Thai tax obligations and compliance

whatYouDontNeed.conclusion: We handle all the legal, regulatory, and operational complexity — you focus on producing great products.

commercialModels.subtitle: Flexible partnership structures to suit your business needs:

direct.description: We import your products and distribute them to your customers in Thailand

wholesale.description: We act as your official Thai distributor, selling to local businesses

private.title: Import Service with Existing Distributor
private.description: Import service when you have your own distributor in Thailand

project.description: One-time or occasional imports for specific events or customers

marketEntry.title: Fast Market Entry
marketEntry.description: Start selling in Thailand within weeks, not months

costEffective.title: Cost-Effective Solution
costEffective.description: No need for expensive local setup or ongoing fixed costs

expertise.title: Local Market Expertise
expertise.description: Navigate Thai business culture and regulations with confidence

network.title: Established Distribution Network
network.description: Access our existing relationships with restaurants, hotels, and retailers

compliance.title: Full Legal Compliance
compliance.description: Ensure 100% regulatory compliance with all Thai import laws

flexibility.title: Scalable & Flexible
flexibility.description: Start small and scale up as your Thai market presence grows

cta.title: Ready to Enter the Thai Market?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss how we can help bring your products to Thailand.

PrivacyPolicyPage.introduction: Wine Import Thailand (operated by Primeline Trading Co., Ltd., "we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.agreement: By using our website, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Wine Import Thailand is a licensed importer and logistics service provider offering import services for wine, spirits, non-alcoholic beverages, and food products into Thailand. Our full company information:

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect both personal and business information when you interact with us, including:

items.personal: Name, email address, phone number, company name
items.business: Business activity, shipping information, product information
items.communication: Communication records (emails, contact forms, quote requests)
items.calculator: Information provided when using our import calculator (estimates only)
items.technical: Technical information (IP address, browser type, cookies, pages visited)

purposes.inquiries: Respond to inquiries and provide quotations
purposes.contracts: Manage contracts, invoices, and legal compliance
purposes.support: Provide customer support and ongoing services
purposes.improvement: Improve our website, services, and tools (such as the import calculator)
purposes.communications: Send important operational or legal communications
purposes.legal: Fulfill legal obligations under Thai law

calculatorDisclaimer.title: Import Calculator Disclaimer
calculatorDisclaimer.description: Our website offers an import cost calculator to help estimate possible import costs based on your provided data. These results are provided for informational purposes only and may vary depending on multiple factors including, but not limited to, product type, volume, regulatory changes, taxes, fees, or customs inspections. Final costs will be determined only after full documentation, product registration, and customs clearance.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR Compliance)
legalBasis.description: For visitors and partners from the European Union, we process your data under the following legal bases:

bases.contract: Performance of a contract or to take steps prior to entering into a contract
bases.legitimate: Legitimate business interests (communication, service improvement, customer support)
bases.consent: Consent (where applicable, such as marketing emails or newsletter subscriptions)

legalBasis.withdrawal: You may withdraw consent at any time by contacting us.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We may share your information only as required to perform our services or by legal obligation:

parties.internal: Internal staff and authorized service providers (IT, logistics, customs brokers)
parties.government: Government agencies (FDA, Excise Department, Customs, etc.)
parties.advisors: Legal and tax advisors as required

dataSharing.noSelling: No personal information is sold, rented, or exchanged with third parties for marketing.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your data only as long as necessary to fulfill legal, regulatory, operational, and contractual obligations.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights (EU & Global)

rights.delete: Delete your personal data where legally permissible
rights.portability: Receive a copy of your data in portable format (where applicable)

yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at:

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.description: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to:

purposes.functionality: Improve site functionality and user experience
purposes.analytics: Analyze website usage (Google Analytics or similar tools)

cookies.control: You may control or disable cookies via your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your user experience.
cookies.noAdvertising: We do not use cookies for targeted advertising or remarketing.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: As our business may involve international clients, your data may be processed or stored outside of your country, including in Thailand. We ensure appropriate safeguards for data transfers where legally required.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external websites.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

TermsConditionsPage.introduction: Welcome to Wine Import Thailand (operated by Primeline Trading Co., Ltd.). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website: wineimportthailand.com (the "Website").
TermsConditionsPage.agreement: By accessing or using this Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the Website.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.description: You agree to use this Website only for lawful purposes. You must not:

restrictions.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Website
restrictions.malicious: Use the Website to transmit malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
restrictions.harmful: Use the Website in any way that may harm, damage, or overload our infrastructure
restrictions.copying: Copy, distribute, or reproduce any content without prior written permission

useOfWebsite.termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access to the Website for any user who violates these Terms.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.ownership: All content on this Website, including text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, is the property of Wine Import Thailand or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.restrictions: You may not copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, transmit, or distribute any part of this Website without our prior written consent.

accuracyOfInformation.title: Accuracy of Information
accuracyOfInformation.description: We make reasonable efforts to ensure that the information provided on this Website is accurate and up-to-date. However:

disclaimers.guarantee: We do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of the information
disclaimers.changes: Information may change at any time without notice
disclaimers.asIs: The Website is provided "as is" and "as available"

accuracyOfInformation.pricing: All pricing, service descriptions, or calculations shown on the Website (including via our Import Calculator) are for general informational purposes only and are not legally binding offers or final quotations.

calculatorDisclaimer.title: Import Calculator Disclaimer
calculatorDisclaimer.description: The import calculator provided on our Website is intended for estimation purposes only. Final import costs may vary depending on multiple factors including:
calculatorDisclaimer.confirmation: Actual import costs will be confirmed by us after full review of your products and documentation.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our Website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

exclusions.damages: We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your access to or use of the Website
exclusions.ownRisk: You use this Website entirely at your own risk

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Your use of the Website is also subject to our Privacy Policy, which governs how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description: We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Updated versions will be posted on this page. Continued use of the Website after any changes means you accept the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Thailand.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact:
